sentences.sContent: More than four thousand soldiers, sailors, and airmen paraded down the Champs Elysées.
sentences.sCn: 超过四千名士兵、水手和飞行员沿着香榭丽舍大街游行。

synos.tran: 游行；阅兵；炫耀；行进；阅兵场

phrases.pCn: [美国英语]学时髦；跟着大众行动

remMethod.val: para(旁边) ＋ de → 展示给旁边的人看 → 游行

trans.tranCn: 游行， 列队前进； 招摇而行
trans.tranOther: to walk or march together to celebrate or protest about something
a public celebration when musical bands, brightly decorated vehicles etc move down the street
